title: President directs Cabinet to take steps to supply fuel continuously
content: During todayâ€™s special meeting of the Cabinet of Ministers, President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has given directives to take steps for a continuous supply of fuel, says Minister Ramesh Pathirana.However, a decision has not been taken to revise the fuel prices, according to the co-Cabinet spokesman.A special Cabinet meeting, chaired by the Head of State, was called this evening to discuss the ongoing power crisis.
